languages.text: {n}Не поворачивая головы, колдун раскатисто изрекает:{/n} "Я тебя вижу, смертное создание. Чувствую твой несмелый разум".
{n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."
languages.original_text: {n}Не поворачивая головы, колдун раскатисто изрекает:{/n} "Я тебя вижу, смертное создание. Чувствую твой несмелый разум".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}巫师并没有转过头，他的声音在房间里回荡。{/n}“我看到你了，凡躯。我感觉到了你孱弱的心灵。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}巫师并没有转过头，他的声音在房间里回荡。{/n}“我看到你了，凡躯。我感觉到了你孱弱的心灵。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Le regard toujours fixé droit devant lui, le sorcier annonce d'une voix retentissante :{/n} « Je vous vois, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Je sens la faiblesse de votre esprit. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard toujours fixé droit devant lui, le sorcier annonce d'une voix retentissante :{/n} « Je vous vois, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Je sens la faiblesse de votre esprit. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーの声が部屋に響き渡る。彼は振り向きもしない。{/n}「見えるぞ、定命の者よ。お前の軟弱な心を感じる」
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーの声が部屋に響き渡る。彼は振り向きもしない。{/n}「見えるぞ、定命の者よ。お前の軟弱な心を感じる」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}El hechicero no se gira, pero su voz recorre la sala como un trueno:{/n} «Te veo, mortal. Siento tu tímida mente».
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hechicero no se gira, pero su voz recorre la sala como un trueno:{/n} «Te veo, mortal. Siento tu tímida mente».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Ohne seinen Kopf zu wenden, lässt der Hexer seine Stimme durch den Raum rollen:{/n} "Ich sehe Euch, sterbliches Ding. Ich spüre Euren schwachen Verstand."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne seinen Kopf zu wenden, lässt der Hexer seine Stimme durch den Raum rollen:{/n} "Ich sehe Euch, sterbliches Ding. Ich spüre Euren schwachen Verstand."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Kafasını çevirmeyen sahirin sesi, odada yankılanıyor.{/n} "Seni görüyorum ölümlü. Uysal zihnini seziyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer does not turn his head as his voice rolls over the room:{/n} "I see you, mortal thing. I sense your meek mind."
